Maintain Established CloudCraze Solutions You are here: SALESFORCE HELP DOCS VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE Update Handlebar Template Overrides for SEO Improvements If you previously created any Handlebar template overrides, update your code to take advantage of link equity improvements in the managed package. REQUIRED EDITIONS Salesforce CompatibilitySalesforce not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions. B2B Commerce Compatibility Any solution upgrading to or installing B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.9 or later Any solution upgrading to or installing B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10) NOTE Changes apply to both Bootstrap 3 and classic Handlebars templates, unless noted otherwise. Replace the goToHome(), goToPLP(), and goToPDP() JavaScript functions. NOTE Previously, a link’s onClick event called these functions to generate the complete URL path to the Home page, Product List page, or Product Detail page. Now, these functions work outside of the link to return a URL value for the link’s href attribute. For each link that uses the goToHome() function, replace it with openHome(). For each link that uses the goToPLP() function, replace it with openPLP()and apply the gp_cat class. For each link that uses the goToPDP() function, replace it with openPDP() and apply the gp_prod class. For example, an old implementation of a Product Detail page link looks like: return new Handlebars.SafeString("" + content + "") The updated implementation looks like: return new Handlebars.SafeString("" + content + ""); Add CSS classes to instances of the {{categoryLink}} and {{productLink}} Handlebars helper functions. These CSS classes disable the default action on click, and execute the openPLP() and openPDP() JavaScript functions. For each instance of {{categoryLink}}, add the cc_cat class. For each instance of {{productLink}}, add the cc_prod class. Replace instances of in links around the storefront logo and the Home icon to use a new Handlebar helper function, {{goHome}}. For example, an existing Bootstrap 3 Handlebar template includes this link: Home The updated implementation looks like: {{goHome this 'cc_phone_logo' 'phoneLogo' icon=(displayIcon 'home')}}Home An existing classic Handlebar template includes this link: The updated implementation looks like: {{goHome this 'brand_phone visible-phone' 'phoneLogo' image=(displayImage this 'classic-logo' src="{!phoneLogo}" alt="home")}} DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE? Let us know so we can improve! Yes No
title: Updating Handlebar Template Overrides for SEO Improvements
